author: controlcthenv
content: Wen holesky, can devs do something. Everyday I check and still no finalization

author: abcoathup
content: September 28 is possible date for relaunch: https://github.com/eth-clients/holesky/pull/73

author: yokem55
content: There are a few of us still plugging along trying to keep Holesky Classic going. We get maybe 1 or 2 blocks in per epoch. It's not great. Even if you are totally online, you mabye get 10-15% of your attestations in, so we are still bleeding out, just not as fast as the folks who are completely down.  But, we *should* get to finality sometime early next week when most of the folks who are down get ejected. And then we'll probably shut down to move on to the real deal.

author: willwhite123
content: Hi there, Will here from Republic Crypto. We've been running a reasonable volume of goerli validators (~110) for a while after purchasing tokens via LayerZero. I'd like to have myself and my team run validators in Holesky indefinitely at scale to support and also enhance our infrastructure and operational capacity. Please let me know anything I do to help with rollout and if nothing needed for now, how I can get access to tokens in Holesky to run thousands of validators indefinitely.
